author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: My Dad has given me a lot of advice, but this advice comes especially from the attitude point of view. He's never told me how to drive a car, how to do a corner, nothing like that. He believe this comes from the talent. You are born with it or you are not born with it.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: I think the people that need to see my talent are seeing it, people who understand F1 well are valuing my performance.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: This feels like a new start for me because it is my first two-year deal, a long-term project in F1. People sometimes underestimate how important that is for a driver to perform. To have that confidence, that support, that mutual trust.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: Politics is something that is bigger than many people would think and you just need to learn how to deal with them and how to accept it and how to treat them. I think that from when you are 10 years old and you look at F1 and don't realise it's there and then it is.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: My recommendation is to try and do the best you can in go-karting to be spotted by a big name like Red Bull or Ferrari. And like that you have a chance. If not, nowadays it's very difficult. It's always been, but these days, even more.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: Having two teams with the same engine and being used to being really close to each other which is the case with Red Bull and Toro Rosso, I think we can do a big step forward if we work together and there's a good relationship between the teams.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: Everyone on the grid gets nervous before a Formula 1 race. It's just how you manage it. It's impossible not to be a bit nervous before a Formula 1 start or even before a World Series start. You have nerves. The thing is, you know how to control them.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: I do try rallying. I do like rallying a lot. We have a rally car there in the countryside in Madrid. And everytime I'm there, I just jump in and have some fun. I really like rallying.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: When there's a rule that you can use only three engines for the whole season, and you are a team that is not worried about 2018, you are worried about being world champions in 2020, you need to make progress.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: You can imagine the long process and what you need to do as a driver to extract the maximum out of the car, what you need to do as a driver talking to the team about what you need, but what also the team can do for you to make that happen.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: There is clearly this gene inside me or this thing inside me that I've always had in my blood. I don't know, but since very little I've always wanted to be in racing cars, and that was without knowing who my dad was and what he was doing for a living.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: I had no idea at two or three years of age that my dad was a rally driver and he was doing doughnuts around the world.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: When I jumped in a go-kart at three or four, with my friends, I was super fast without anyone really teaching me.
author: Carlos Sainz Jr

quote: If you like going a certain way, then be bold and do it.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Pressure's what you make of it.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Everything you can learn from is an opportunity to become stronger.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I will always find a way to find a positive from things.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: On a bad day, I'll still have a conscious thing in my mind reminding me that what I think of as a bad day is still a very good day in probably 90% of the world's population's eyes.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: In the end, you have to just pull the trigger. Trust the car, trust the brakes, just go.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: You can't always win - although we always try!
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Sometimes you have a bad day, and you're like, 'I'm over this, and I just want to play tennis,' or do another sport that doesn't require any other variables, but then you have a good day, and it's like, it's amazing, and the success makes up for it.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: The car is a big part of it, but you need to be a good driver to get the equipment to the top. You need both.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I'm sure there are some things I'm not good at.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: If I am putting myself out there and taking some of these risks, then I want to do it properly.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I'm the most ripped guy on the grid, let's just say that.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I try to wake up naturally but set an alarm so I don't sleep in too late.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I think, in general, the sport's frustrating because I think it's one of only a few sports in the world where you've got so many other variables. Not taking anything away from the winner, but the best man doesn't always win. I think part of that makes the sport really exciting, and part of it makes it heartbreaking.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: When you're young, the temptation is maybe to think, 'More is more.' But a lot of the time less is more.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I would like it to be remembered; I would love to be World Champion one day and have my name on the list. That is the real dream - although I am sure it is the dream for pretty much all the Formula 1 drivers.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I'm in this sport to win but win by being the best, not by being lucky.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I enjoyed physical education and lunchtime. The social aspect of school was great, but as soon as I left school, I wanted to get out there and race. I couldn't sit still for long.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I'm sure everyone has a cool story behind how they got into Formula One, but, for me, Perth, you know, not only in Australia is it detached, but it's detached from the whole world.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I feel like even if I was to, say, trip and fall over on the way to the car and scratch all my arms, by the time I got in the car, it would be blacked out in my head.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: With racing, there's not one thing you need to be really strong at, it's a combination. You need a good base of cardio, good core, good neck strength. I think core and neck are the most important, but it's certainly not my favorite. Neck training is pretty boring.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I signed a dog collar. Someone gave me their dog - a live dog - and I signed its collar. When they handed me the dog, I didn't know what to do. That was weird.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: To get the Red Bull junior drive was like a massive pressure off... I didn't have to go around asking Mum and Dad to sell their house or ask friends for funding. The instant feeling was, 'Oh wow, amazing.'
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I'm very competitive. If I have to 'turn it on,' I know how to. The switch isn't hard to find, don't worry.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I would love to do a one-off race somewhere - NASCAR would be awesome.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I don't really cook much, to be honest.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: When I came into Red Bull, everyone thought, 'He's just the happy, nice guy; he's fast, but he can't race hard with these top guys.' That was a reputation I had to dismiss.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: The way I see it is if I can't be happy doing this job, which is my dream job, then what's going to make me happy in life?
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I will be happier if I crash by trying than not trying and running around behind the same guy for 70 laps.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Being an F1 driver is a crazy job but not what everyone expects. My year consists of 20% driving and 80% media, marketing, and travel.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Because of my schedule and dietary requirements, I don't party a lot, but when I can let my hair down, I will; I think that's healthy. I love a weekend in Vegas.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Music is how I unwind. I love going to see bands or DJs at a festival or a dive bar. My taste is pretty diverse.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I don't see my family often enough, but when we do catch up, it's somewhere new in the world. They get to travel more than they would if I wasn't doing this sport.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: People have seen now I am a racer, and I have big intentions in the sport, and I am prepared to get my shoulders out if I need to.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: If I am going to race, I will put everything on the line.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: The day I do get a championship-winning car, I will run with it. I will capitalize on every part of that beautiful thing.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Pretty much all the drivers I get on with, at least to say 'Hi' and have a conversation. But when the helmet's on, you don't care who it is. You have no sympathy: someone blows an engine in front of you, if it means you gain a position, then you're smiling.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: 2014 is a year I'll remember for a long time - it was definitely a breakthrough in my mind as well. Standing on the top step of the podium a few times was icing on the cake.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I enjoy being outdoors, hanging out with friends, and maybe snapping the neck off a couple of beers.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Formula One was just cool. I loved racing, all types of racing, but from a young age, Formula One was the noise and everything, and that's what I was drawn to. author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I don't like letting anyone down. Not many people get satisfaction out of letting others down.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I do a bit of Brazilian ju-jitsu when I can. I like a bit of that.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I love mountain-biking or any form of bikes, like dirt bikes; I love getting out there, although obviously I have to be careful.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: In Formula 1, you need a great level of endurance because the races are long, so you need a pretty good base endurance.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: When you spend time working on something for a time period, and then it doesn't correlate, it decreases your motivation.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: As far as the outside things go with Red Bull - I like the brand a lot, and obviously, I like the team a lot. We've always been a good fit for each other, so from that side, it's all been really good.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: Normally, if I don't qualify as well as I think I can, I seem to carry a little chip on my shoulder for the race, and that normally helps me out.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I'd prefer no practices and just Saturday, Sunday. Just qualify Saturday morning, race Saturday afternoon, and race again Sunday. Fewer laps of nonsense and more laps of meaningful business.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: This sport's crazy.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I feel '14 didn't just shape me and my approach from then on: it changed the level of overtaking from other guys in the sport as well. Not many people were doing that, coming from a long way back and trying big passing moves.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I've never really been too fussed about the kind of teammate I have.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: People might call me a liar for this, but I want a fast teammate, I think for two reasons: it's always going to get more out of yourself, and it's always going to be a more true evaluation of where you stand.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: If I win the title, I want to know I was the best guy that year, and to be the best, you've got to go against the best.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I like having as many teammates as possible. It's great because the more people you can learn from, the better I think it will make you as a driver.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: When I joined Formula One, I knew that what I found is that the cars are so much faster, and it took me a little while to understand where to always put the car.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: In racing, things start coming up quicker, and the slipstream is stronger, so even judging in the mirrors how quick the cars are approaching isn't always easy.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I've learned what F1 is like, and it is an extremely competitive sport on and off the track.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: We know - relationships in this sport, it's very hard to have a really great relationship.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: I like high-speed corners, but with the F111, it is taking a little time to build up to that.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: For my family, it was quite emotional because it has always been a dream of mine to be in Formula 1. For them, to see it come true was quite a special feeling.
author: Daniel Ricciardo

quote: No matter how good a driver you are, you have to have the right car and the right team behind you in order to succeed.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: It's very, very special for me. This is where I've grown up, it's my home, and winning the Monaco Grand Prix is the highlight of any racing driver's career and for me a childhood dream. It being my home makes it all the more special, unbelievable.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: People in Finland have also adopted me because of my dad, and that's great, but it's the one language I can't speak.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: I remember my father's last race very clearly when he drove at Hockenheim in front of 100,000 people and I was sitting next to him on the roof of his car and waving to the fans. That was the moment when I thought: 'One day I want to do the same.'
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: Pressure is always a part of a racing driver's life, but my father helped me a lot on my way to becoming a F1 driver.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: Image has an influence on what sort of car I will get to drive or deals that I'm offered by teams.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: For me it was a normality having a father who was a world champion. I grew up with that, so it was never extra pressure. And I've never felt the need to emerge from his shadow.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: Winning at Monaco feels unbelievable, because it's such a special race and it's also my home race. My first memories were of watching Ayrton Senna here with his yellow helmet, and one day dreaming to win the Monaco GP.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: My dad is a great manager. He's not just competent - he's very clever.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: I am a demanding person to interview.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: It is a burden because I get asked about my father all the time. I just need to accept that he was a champion before me.
author: Nico Rosberg

quote: If I could throw my phone away, I would probably do it. It's always on silent, and I don't like when it rings and people are calling. We could live without those things in the past when we just had a phone on the street somewhere, on the corner or at the house. I have no interest in telling all the people what I do every day and where I am.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: There's always a lot of talk about motivation to race, but nobody really knows what I do or what I think apart from myself, so I don't really care what people think.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: Since I started in motor racing I've worked with people from all over the world. We are all here to go racing and prejudice will never play any part in that.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: Do you have any ambitions outside racing? My main ambition at the moment, whether inside or outside racing, is to become Formula 1 World Champion.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: I just love the American spirit of racing. It feels just great to get involved with that.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: When I was a kid, I would watch the grands prix. Everyone dreamt of becoming a race driver, while I only started thinking about it when I was 18 or 19. Only at that age did I seriously start thinking about this job. Before then, I would change ideas from one second to the next.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: When I did some Nascar races this year I noticed that I was increasingly missing the racing side, to race against each other, because in rallying you really race against the clock.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: In F1 too many things overshadow the racing. There is too much politics.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: I'm delighted to be coming back to Formula 1 after a two-year break, and I'm grateful to Lotus Renault GP for offering me this opportunity.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: It was an easy choice to return with Lotus Renault GP as I have been impressed by the scope of the team's ambition.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: In rallying every curve, every hill may be different than you thought. That makes it interesting.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: My time in the World Rally Championship has been a useful stage in my career, but I can't deny the fact that my hunger for F1 has recently become overwhelming.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: You always want to have a winning car, but there is no guarantee that it will be.
author: Kimi Raikkonen

quote: Without going to what I think is my limit. I always say that my ideal is to get pole with the minimum effort, and to win the race at the slowest speed possible.
author: Alain Prost

quote: You were not in control You had no visibility: maybe there was a car in front of you, maybe not.
author: Alain Prost

quote: People don't understand that it was maybe my biggest pleasure to drive an F1 car when it's wet.
author: Alain Prost

quote: When you win a race like this the feeling is very, very good.
author: Alain Prost

quote: Sometimes I think I could have got some better results if I had a different mentality; if I could have pushed hard and attacked. But then I would have had a good chance of making a mistake.
author: Alain Prost

quote: Maybe I am not French, maybe I am from nowhere.
author: Alain Prost

quote: It's like when people talk about driving F1 cars in the rain. I have absolutely no problem with it.
author: Alain Prost

quote: It's not too good to have this attitude in F1. It could be a disadvantage.
author: Alain Prost

quote: The people who criticise you will not be the ones taking care of your legs when you are in your wheelchair. People who never drove a car in these conditions, they just don't know.
author: Alain Prost

quote: You want to have fun but you also want to work well. Sometimes I was quite happy at Ferrari, because we would have fun, but then they could not stop having fun and go back to the real work.
author: Alain Prost

quote: It's always better to speak the language of the team. Not only for the direct contact with everyone - sometimes it also helps you to understand the mentality of the people in the team a bit better.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I think maybe the English don't want to try something and look stupid, because they are a bit reserved.
author: Alain Prost

quote: A German team could be quite good. But maybe they are a little bit too convinced that they are the best.
author: Alain Prost

quote: You can't always have the best team. It's always a compromise.
author: Alain Prost

quote: Some Italians are geniuses, but you have to find a balance.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I have had some problems because the French don't like people to have success, they don't like the number one.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I like the mentality of the Americans. It's like when you talk about money.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I have no problem with the people who work hard to get success. But I think people are very jealous about success. I work very hard and they don't appreciate that.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I always work the same way, starting from the beginning of the weekend, so I know at the beginning of the race, from all that I have analysed during the practice, whether I will win the race or not.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I was very interested in that. It is very important to have confidence as well as to build up experience.
author: Alain Prost

quote: That is an important part of my success. Another big part of my success is that I hated not to finish a race.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I have always had this mentality because I hated to break anything on the car.
author: Alain Prost

quote: One of my biggest problems this season was with the clutch at the start of the race. I hate to risk the car.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I don't like to go over curbs, because I don't want to be hard on the car.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I remember in the first part of the race I was sixth and I could have gone quicker, but I had to go slow. It was one of the most difficult things I have ever done.
author: Alain Prost

quote: In 1980 I finished three or four times in seventh place.
author: Alain Prost

quote: So in fact the only thing you can judge in this sport its the longterm. You can judge a career or a season, but not one race.
author: Alain Prost

quote: I'm brave to say that I won't take this sort of risk.
author: Alain Prost

quote: When I test I never go right to the limit. Only because when you are below the limit you can go at the same speed all day, and that's the only way you can be absolutely sure about what you are testing.
author: Alain Prost

quote: It is going to be special to drive in the Netherlands because it means I can take part in a Formula One demonstration in a country where I have a lot of family and friends.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: After hurting myself like that, I could not go back immediately to racing. I was in no condition, mentally or physically. That helped me to strengthen myself to go through the hard times that were ahead with my business, and to be successful.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: In two years, I'll be making more than Michael Schumacher.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: Through F1, I bought my own boat. I learned to fly my own plane and helicopter. And my job with my company is a reflection of everything motor racing taught me.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: Events like this mean we can give something back to the people that support us, and hopefully everyone will have a great day and we can put on a good show for them.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: I am really looking forward to driving another of my father's car at the show in Rotterdam.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: I have quite a lot of fans in Holland because that is where my mother is from, in fact I have a fan club there, and the fans don't always get the chance to see us drive the cars because getting to races across Europe isn't always possible for them.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: The Lotus is a couple of years newer than the Williams was, and as the pace of development in F1 cars is so quick, I expect it to be another completely different experience, but still one that I know I'm going to enjoy.
author: Nelson Piquet

quote: I will be unhappy if I know I have not accomplished something I should have done that was possible.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I'm a fighter, I'm a winner, and I'm not interested in just battling my team-mate for the back of the grid.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I tend not to really think about what other people say. I'd rather just try and focus on what I'm doing, try and win basically.
author: Lando Norris

quote: Well, it's looks like I've a love-hate thing going on with Monaco.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I think Weetabix and full-fat milk is what it is all about.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I don't think there's any point going for second or third.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I just get annoyed at myself. A lot of swearing goes on generally when I am driving.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I saw MotoGP on TV first, before I saw F1 and other types of car racing. It's what I got more into. It was cool, there was good, exciting racing.
author: Lando Norris

quote: Rule number one is: Beat your team-mate.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I like to paint my own helmets. I design my own suit and boots, I like being unique in that way.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I want to go down in the history books with what I've achieved.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I did suffer a lot since karting, with my size and everything, not really having a clue what to do when I started karting. So I suffered in every category: F4, F3, F2. Not so much F2 but I've had to kind of play catch-up quite a bit and in some ways, F1 was a bit nicer with power steering.
author: Lando Norris

quote: No driver is perfect.
author: Lando Norris

quote: It's rule number one, really - beating your teammate.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I am absolutely my own biggest critic.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I had a much better view with the halo than I expected.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I'm an all-or-nothing kind of guy, I guess.
author: Lando Norris

quote: There are going to be things I'm not going to be great at, times when I make mistakes, 100%.
author: Lando Norris

quote: Overall there's going to be things I'm not great at.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I haven't gone out of my way to seek advice from people I don't know.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I've missed out on a lot of things, going out with friends.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I enjoy driving on the sim, doing stuff like that, staying at home.
author: Lando Norris

quote: To be announced as a race driver for McLaren is a dream come true.
author: Lando Norris

quote: Confidence is always a good thing to have going into the weekend. Especially where it's quite difficult to put the lap together.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I focus on my own job.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I think as long as I do a good job and put in all my effort to proving that I'm worth it, then everything should be fine.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I'm loving my role as a McLaren Young Driver, spending time in the simulator at the McLaren Technology Centre and attending some Grands Prix with the team.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I think the F2 tyres are probably one of the hardest things to adapt to, harder than the Formula One Pirellis were to get used to.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I know a lot of people say they always believed they could get into F1, but I didn't quite believe that, certainly not when I was 7 and maybe not until I was 14. It was always so far away.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I probably work harder, putting in a lot of time and effort, than a lot of drivers because all I think about, and all I do, is to do with racing, trying to make myself a better driver.
author: Lando Norris

quote: It's just trying to do the best job I can in these opportunities that I get to show what I can do, be consistent, have good feedback, be fast, at the same time not make mistakes.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I don't know who I would have been if I never watched MotoGP.
author: Lando Norris

quote: There's so many bits on a car these days it's hard to know where everything is. You have a bit of an idea but if you are behind someone and you suddenly change direction it's hard to know exactly where the car is.
author: Lando Norris

quote: Of course it would be nice for everybody and myself if we could win but we can still have a personal or a team win if we achieve a target that is effectively a win for us.
author: Lando Norris

quote: It's what counts, isn't it, on the Sunday, rather than pre-season testing. If you lock up, you do a little mistake, it's nothing, but if you do it on Sunday, you lose a place or you have to box for a flat spot or something like that. It's a much bigger problem.
author: Lando Norris

quote: How you go about testing is just very different to just being in the situation of qualifying, having to go out, having to nail the lap.
author: Lando Norris

quote: In testing, you make a mistake, you just say 'OK we'll have another go' instead of it being the only chance you get.
author: Lando Norris

quote: Having the support from everyone, the bosses, whoever within the team, definitely makes it much easier for me as a driver.
author: Lando Norris

quote: It's not like I'm nervous of people seeing what I can or can't do on camera or on TV or anything, or what my engineers think.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I need to do well and show I'm a worthy driver in F1.
author: Lando Norris

quote: In the ideal world, if I was perfect, I'd be able to beat every teammate that I have, in every race.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I guess for every driver the aim is to beat their teammate.
author: Lando Norris

quote: There's definitely going to be things that I'm not very good at, things I can improve.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I had to drive with a roof in LMP2, and I managed to get used to that quite quickly - although it's still not a Halo, it's still different to what I'm used to.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I started off riding motorbikes and at that point my hero was Valentino Rossi.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I used to watch some F1 races but I was never straightaway thinking 'that is what I want to do.'
author: Lando Norris

quote: I turned away from bikes when I got a bambino kart for my seventh birthday and started doing some karting, just around some cones at home, but I didn't think at that point I knew I wanted to go into F1, it was more just for fun.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I liked watching Rossi, his style, his colours and everything. He was someone I looked up to and until now he is still my only hero. He is the king of motorbikes and most people like Rossi mainly because he comes across as a pretty fun and good character. He is cool and has a good style and look.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I am sure as everyone knows that I am not the happiest if I don't do a good job in qualifying or the race.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I think beating myself up sometimes and knowing I am not happy when I do it makes me work harder to do a good job.
author: Lando Norris

quote: Joining McLaren didn't add a lot of pressure but of course you want to make sure you can impress them.
author: Lando Norris

quote: My favourite car I drove in the 'shoot out' at Silverstone was the 2016 Mercedes DTM car. I loved every moment in it, the downforce being particularly surprising.
author: Lando Norris

quote: The first time I used a simulator was in 2014 when I was competing in the Ginetta Junior Championship.
author: Lando Norris

quote: The McLaren prizes can only help me in my quest to ultimately reach Formula One.
author: Lando Norris

quote: I'm definitely more one of the drivers who would want to do Daytona, Le Mans, and the Indy 500.

author: Juan Pablo Montoya

quote: My parents were a formidable team and worked flat-out all the time. I learnt so much from them about business and life.
author: David Coulthard

quote: My grandfather took part in the Tulip Rally in an old Austin Sheerline and even competed in the Monte Carlo Rally. My father was the Scottish karting champion.
author: David Coulthard

quote: In my late teens I progressed from karting into single-seater racing, starting with Formula Ford in 1989. I did well and won the Autosport magazine Young Driver of the Year award, which came with a test drive in a McLaren F1 car.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I stopped eating fattening food and, before I knew what had happened, I was bulimic.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I'm not big on holidays. I tend to tie them in with work - I'll grab a few days' holiday in Dubai when I'm in Bahrain racing and a week in Thailand between the Malaysian test and the Malaysian Grand Prix.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I like the Amanpuri in Phuket and have been there several times. It's made up of individual Thai-style bungalows with their own private beach. There's a very laid-back atmosphere; the service and the food are wonderful too.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I've become much more economical with my packing as I've got older. I know very well how hotel laundries work and I pack accordingly.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I avoid cheap holidays. You get what you pay for and this is especially true when it comes to holidays. I'd sacrifice other things to ensure I had a good time on holiday.
author: David Coulthard

quote: Historically, when you have a big change in regulations, there's one team that gets it right, and the others have to then spend the next couple years catching up.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I have great admiration for a number of drivers.
author: David Coulthard

quote: Having lived my life at 200 miles an hour, I'm used to making decisions at high speed and thinking quickly on my feet. That has been a real asset to me in business.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I find it fascinating how much I learned in F1 and did not realise it.
author: David Coulthard

quote: Ron Dennis redefined engineering in F1 with his high attention to detail. That detail included non-engineering things too, such as various rules, such as no hands in pockets, no drinks on work tables. present yourself in a certain way.
author: David Coulthard

quote: There are lots of similarities between sport and business. And in both if you do well people will reward you for it.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I miss my sister every day. Knowing that I will never engage with her again really hurts. People often ask what I miss most about Scotland and it's her.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I've never lost my Scots accent but my son has a classic British accent.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I am quite a cautious driver and my wife does most of the driving.
author: David Coulthard

quote: You have to drive at a speed that won't affect your decision-making ability and that may be well below the limit.
author: David Coulthard

quote: Sometimes people ask you as a Formula 1 driver whether your mind wanders to other things. Well, when you're in the car in real moments of intensity, you don't think about anything else.
author: David Coulthard

quote: The story of Lewis Hamilton the racing driver is so much more than what happens on the track - you get an insight into what's going on in his life day to day. It's such a contrast with someone like Fernando Alonso, for example, about whom we know almost nothing apart from his sporting record. Hamilton lays himself bare.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I was teammates with Mika Hakkinen for seven years, and he was an incredibly fast and talented driver. He was very fair, and that's something that stands out.
author: David Coulthard

quote: If you enter a sport, you'd rather reflect on competing against people who are considered the best in history, rather than having what could be considered a weak season and winning the championship.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I'm proud to have won what I consider the classic races - Monaco, Silverstone, Spa, Monza - it was nice to have the chance to stand at the top of the podium.
author: David Coulthard

quote: Silverstone is a special place, it's the home of the British Grand Prix. To have won there a couple of times is something I'm very proud of.
author: David Coulthard

quote: I respect all of the teams, its a huge commitment to put an F1 car on the track and I'd like it to be as sustainable as possible but nobody gives handouts in life and that's the case in motor racing.
author: David Coulthard

quote: F1 I think reflects every day life in many ways.
author: David Coulthard

author: Jenson Button

author: Jenson Button

quote: To understand the intensity of driving an F1 car, you have to be in it. When you're driving a 750hp machine at 200mph, the noise and the vibrations are incredible. author: Jenson Button

quote: I love cycling, running and swimming. In recent years I've competed regularly in triathlons, which means I don't find the physical side of driving a struggle any more.
author: Jenson Button

quote: To drive an F1 car you have to be a little mad. On the morning of a race there's a mix of excitement and fear. If it's a wet track, then it's worse as you're not in control most of the time, which is the thing all drivers fear the most.
author: Jenson Button

quote: My school reports always used to point out that my concentration levels were appalling. I never listened in class because I was always daydreaming about racing. I never thought for a moment about doing anything else. There was no guarantee that I'd make a career in it but I never had any plan B.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I haven't got the yacht any more. The cost of running it was crazy. But it was so much fun while I had it. I don't regret it.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I love the role of being the experienced driver and that is definitely the case next year - I think I am the most experienced guy in F1 next year.

author: Jenson Button

author: Jenson Button

author: Jenson Button

quote: When you're in a car which can win every race, or fight for a win every race, that is pressure.
author: Jenson Button

quote: You look back and you remember the good, the bad and the ugly.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I think as a 20-year-old you expect life to always be easy. You get given a good hand and the chance to race in Formula One. You think the driver can make the difference, can make up for everything else within the team. But that is not the case. You are racing in such a competitive sport so that doesn't happen.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I have made lots of mistakes in terms of contracts and spending money when I shouldn't have spent money.
author: Jenson Button

quote: My time at Honda was amazing. Some of my best times in Formula One, actually. I might not have won races, just one race, but I had a lot of fun.
author: Jenson Button

quote: We all drive differently and have different styles. For me I need a car I can develop beneath me and feel comfortable in. If the car feels neutral and unbalanced it doesn't work for me.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I need to develop a car and engineer a car in a position that feels comfortable for me, and I don't think anyone can do a better job than I can in that position. The problem for me is if I can't get the car there I do struggle more than some.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I always think I should try to get to bed early, but then I can't stop myself from watching telly and fiddling around on the net.
author: Jenson Button

quote: When I'm on my own, I can be negative. I need my friends and family around to help pick me up if I've had a bad qualifying session. I think insecurity plagues a lot of sportspeople.
author: Jenson Button

quote: When I do retire, I know for a fact that I'll never be able to replace the incredible feeling I get when I'm driving an F1 car.
author: Jenson Button

quote: If I run I lose so much weight, which I need because you're limited on weight when you are a tall driver. And have you seen marathon runners? They're quite skinny.
author: Jenson Button

quote: In the car and in front of the camera I tend to be very calm but behind the scenes I can get fired up and passionate, I just don't see the need to shout my mouth off in public.
author: Jenson Button

quote: Women don't get the same opportunities that men get in racing, so they don't get to learn race craft.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I don't purposely speed, but I might go over by five or six miles an hour from time to time. It doesn't give me a buzz driving on normal roads, because I can't go fast enough. It's never going to be anything like an F1 car.
author: Jenson Button

quote: It doesn't matter who wins if I don't. I only care if I win. I'm jealous of anyone else who wins.
author: Jenson Button

author: Jenson Button

quote: I can't eat whatever I want, definitely not. I'm always controlled because I do a lot of fitness and triathlons, not just Formula One, so I always make sure I eat the right things.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I think social networks are really working for the drivers, because we're able to talk directly to fans and they get first-hand information. And I think it's great for the partners as well and the businesses that are involved in Formula One.
author: Jenson Button

quote: The fast, flowing parts, the high-speed corners, that's where a Formula One car is at its best - changes of direction, pulling high g-forces left and right.
author: Jenson Button

quote: If I ever have a son, and if he wants to follow in my footsteps in Formula 1, my main responsibility will be to point out some of the negatives.
author: Jenson Button

quote: If someone was making a movie about F1 in the last six months, they wouldn't need to add a Hollywood ending. If they do make that movie, it's got to be 'The Curious Case Of Jenson Button,' where I've lived my life backwards. I'd like Johnny Depp to play me but he wouldn't be quite right.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I've spent as much as 30 grand on a watch but it's not about flaunting my wealth. I don't have many extravagances but watches are my biggest one. I must have 30 of them now. I've been collecting since the age of nine, when I won a black TAG in a karting event.
author: Jenson Button

quote: The only time I think about life beyond F1 is when I contemplate becoming a dad. But there's no way that's going to happen while I'm still racing. To be successful in F1 you need to be very selfish in lots of ways and you're away from home for long periods. That's not the kind of father I want to be.
author: Jenson Button

quote: Yeah, I'm the Brit who isn't Lewis Hamilton that woke up and realised he was good. I got that tag because I was young, flying around in jets and driving fast cars. I always took my driving seriously, but I suppose I enjoyed life... But I'm not a playboy.
author: Jenson Button

quote: I felt confident at 24, but I am a better driver now.
author: Jenson Button

quote: My father did everything for me. He was awesome.
author: Jenson Button

author: Jenson Button

quote: I always sleep really well, particularly before a race, when the adrenaline's pumping.
author: Jenson Button

quote: For me, triathlons were something that was down to me and my fitness. Now, I really enjoy the pain in the triathlon of chasing someone down. It's a bit like chasing down Nico Rosberg in the last few laps at Silverstone - it makes you feel alive.
author: Jenson Button

quote: You're pulling 4-5G for a lot of the corners around the lap. We build up lactic acid because there are a lot of vibrations in the car, and you have to have strong legs to hit the brake pedal. We need to be fit to do every lap at 100%.

author: Valtteri Bottas

author: Valtteri Bottas

quote: In general, I like healthy foods. Everything that's natural and clean.
